title: Apacta

fields.api_key: Uses the user's API token found from within the control panel in "settings" -> "additional settings"

company_id.description: Only filled out if this represents another company within Apacta (used for partners)

erp_id.description: If company has integration to an ERP system, and the contacts are synchronized, this will be the ERP-systems ID of this contact

url.description: The url from which this originated

errors.description: Object that contains details information about which properties failed validation and what rules they failed.

url.description: The url from which this originated

extra_price.description: Additional cost on this employee (pension, vacation etc.)

receive_form_mails.description: If `true` the employee will receive an email receipt of every form submitted

sale_price.description: The price this employee costs per hour when working

deleted.description: READ-ONLY - only present if it's an deleted object

actions.title: cities.get
actions.description: Get list of cities supported in Apacta

zip_code.description: Used to search for a city with specific zip code

actions.title: clocking_records.get
actions.description: Get a list of clocking records

active.description: Used to search for active clocking records

actions.title: clocking_records.post
actions.description: Create clocking record for authenticated user

actions.title: clocking_records.checkout.post
actions.description: Checkout active clocking record for authenticated user

actions.title: contact_types.get
actions.description: Get list of contact types supported in Apacta

actions.title: contact_types.contact_type_id.get
actions.description: Get details about one contact type

name.description: Used to search for a contact with a specific name

cvr.description: Search for values in CVR field

ean.description: Search for values in EAN field

erp_id.description: Search for values in ERP id field

contact_type.description: Used to show only contacts with with one specific `ContactType`

city.description: Used to show only contacts with with one specific `City`

erp_id.description: If company has integration to an ERP system, and the contacts are synchronized, this will be the ERP-systems ID of this contact

actions.title: currencies.get
actions.description: Get list of currencies supported in Apacta

actions.title: employee_hours.get
actions.description: Used to retrieve details about the logged in user's hours

data.description: One element per form in the period

total_hours.description: The amount of hours in seconds

actions.title: form_field_types.get
actions.description: Get list of form field types

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the form_fields

identifier.description: Used to filter on the `identifier` of the form_fields

actions.title: form_fields.post
actions.description: Add a new field to a `Form`

actions.title: form_templates.get
actions.description: Get array of form_templates for your company

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the form_templates

identifier.description: Used to filter on the `identifier` of the form_templates

pdf_template_identifier.description: Used to filter on the `pdf_template_identifier` of the form_templates

description.description: Used to filter on the `description` of the form_templates

extended.description: Used to have extended details from the forms from the `Form`'s `FormFields`

date_from.description: Used in conjunction with `date_to` to only show forms within these dates - format like `2016-28-05`

date_to.description: Used in conjunction with `date_from` to only show forms within these dates - format like `2016-28-30`

project_id.description: Used to filter on the `project_id` of the forms

created_by_id.description: Used to filter on the `created_by_id` of the forms

form_template_id.description: Used to filter on the `form_template_id` of the forms

actions.title: forms.post
actions.description: Used to add a form into the system

actions.title: forms.form_id.delete
actions.description: You can only delete the forms that you've submitted yourself

contact_id.description: Used to filter on the `contact_id` of the invoices

project_id.description: Used to filter on the `project_id` of the invoices

invoice_number.description: Used to filter on the `invoice_number` of the invoices

barcode.description: Used to filter on the `barcode` of the materials

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the materials

project_id.description: Used to find materials used in specific project by `project_id`

currently_rented.description: Used to find currently rented materials

actions.title: materials.material_id.rentals.get
actions.description: Show list of rentals for specific material

actions.title: ping.get
actions.description: Check if API is up and API key works

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the products

product_number.description: Used to filter on the `product_number` of the products

barcode.description: Used to filter on the `barcode` of the products

actions.title: project_statuses.project_status_id.get
actions.description: Get details about one contact type

show_all.description: Unless this is set to `true` only open projects will be shown

project_status.description: ID's of `ProjectStatus(s)` only to look in

project_status_id.description: Used to filter on the `project_status_id` of the projects

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the projects

actions.title: projects.project_id.files.get
actions.description: Used to show files uploaded to a project from wall post or form

actions.description: Show file uploaded to a project from wall post or form

actions.description: Edit file uploaded to a project from wall post or form

actions.description: Returns files belonging to the project, not uploaded from wall post or form

actions.description: View specific user assigned to project

name.description: Used to filter on the `name` of the stock_locations

sum.description: Amount of seconds - should only be included when using is_all_day, otherwise will be calculated from from_time and to_time

actions.description: List possible time entry unit types

actions.description: List possible time entry value types

last_name.description: Used to filter on the `last_name` of the users

email.description: Used to filter on the `email` of the users

stock_location_id.description: Used to filter on the `stock_location_id` of the users

extra_price.description: Additional cost on this employee (pension, vacation etc.)

receive_form_mails.description: If `true` the employee will receive an email receipt of every form submitted
